create_a_planner_empty_state_subText: Click on ‘Create planner’ to get started with your lesson planning
delete_planner_warning_subtext: You are deleting the planner titled ‘{{plannerName}}’. <3>This action cannot be undone.</3> Would you still like to continue?
duplicate_all_sections_and_items: Duplicate the entire planner with all sections and content
duplicate_options_select_label: How would you like to duplicate this planner
move_content_to_another_section_subtitle: Content will be moved from this block to another block
duplicate_content_to_another_section_sub: A copy of this content will be added to the block you select below
no_sections_created_for_this_date: No blocks created for this date
clear_card_body_message: You are clearing all content from the ‘{{sectionName}}’ block on {{date}}. This action cannot be undone. Would you still like to continue?
clear_all_content_disable_tooltip_text: No content added to this date yet
card_details_label: Select details within the block that you would like to include in the download
planner_configuration_group_label: Select details you wish to see in the default view of your planner
section_item_text_placeholder: Type your description for this block here
discard_message_edit: All changes made to this block will be discarded. Would you like to continue?
discard_message_create: All details added to this block will be discarded. Would you like to continue?
empty_state_class_planner_subtext: Once a planner is created for this class you will be able to view it here
empty_state_daily_planner_title: No blocks created for this date yet
clear_column_body_message: You are clearing all content from all blocks in <1>‘{{date}}’.</1> This action cannot be undone. Would you still like to continue?
duplicate_checkbox_label: Also include content, resources and tasks added to blocks
delete_section_warning: Please note that once you click on ‘Delete’, any content added to this block will also be removed. This action cannot be undone.
disabled_tooltip_message: No content added to this block yet
view_access_empty_state_title: No blocks created for this date yet
select_what_parts_of_the_panner_you_want: Select what parts of the planner you want to share
download_modal_info_text: The PDF of this planner will be emailed to <1>{{email}}</1>. Please note that it might take a few minutes before you receive the email.
repeat_task_subtitle: ‘{{label}}’ will also be added to the block selected below
create_planner_family_share_tooltip_text: You will be able to share this planner with family members once you’ve created it
restore_class_planner_modal_description: Are you sure you want to restore this weekly planner?
class_planner_empty_instructions_subtitl: Weekly planners that are deleted from classes will appear here
